instruction.en: 1. Power on the smart plug, make sure it does not belong to any Z-Wave network. Press and hold down action button for over 10 seconds, if the LED indicator flashes yellow slowly, it means it does not belong to any network. Repower the smart plug/Triple press the action button on the smart plug to put it into inclusion mode.

To remove the smart plug, triple press the reset button. 
The smart plug will be set to exclusion mode, and waiting to be excluded, then the smart plug will be excluded to the network.
